mapper.select: SELECT u.user_name AS userName, es.updated_at AS entrepreneurSubscribeUpdatedAt, es.entrepreneur_subscribe_end_at AS entrepreneurSubscribeEndAt, es.entrepreneur_subscribe_orderid AS orderId, es.entrepreneur_subscribe_payment AS entrepreneurSubscribePayment FROM entrepreneur_subscribe_payment es JOIN entrepreneur e ON e.entrepreneur_code=es.entrepreneur_code JOIN Member u ON u.user_code=e.user_code;

SELECT es.entrepreneur_subscribe_payment AS entrepreneurSubscribePayment, es.updated_at AS entrepreneurSubscribeUpdatedAt, /*es.created_at AS createdAt*/ es.entrepreneur_subscribe_end_at AS entrepreneurSubscribeEndAt, es.entrepreneur_subscribe_orderid AS entrepreneurSubscribeOrderId FROM entrepreneur_subscribe_payment es JOIN entrepreneur e ON e.entrepreneur_code=es.entrepreneur_code JOIN Member u ON u.user_code=e.user_code WHERE u.user_code=#{userCode} LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM entrepreneur_subscribe_payment es JOIN entrepreneur e ON e.entrepreneur_code = es.entrepreneur_code JOIN Member u ON u.user_code = e.user_code WHERE u.user_code=#{userCode}
